黑.definition: black; dark; sinister; secret; shady; illegal; to hide (sth) away; to vilify; (loanword) to hack (computing)

黑乎乎.definition: variant of 黑糊糊[hei1 hu1 hu1]

黑五類.definition: the "five black categories" (Cultural Revolution term), i.e. landlords, rich peasants, counterrevolutionaries, bad elements and rightists

黑兀鷲.definition: (bird species of China) red-headed vulture (Sarcogyps calvus)

黑冠山雀.definition: (bird species of China) rufous-vented tit (Periparus rubidiventris)

黑冠椋鳥.definition: (bird species of China) Brahminy starling (Sturnia pagodarum)

黑冠鳽.definition: (bird species of China) Malayan night heron (Gorsachius melanolophus)

黑冠鵑隼.definition: (bird species of China) black baza (Aviceda leuphotes)

黑冠黃鵯.definition: (bird species of China) black-crested bulbul (Rubigula flaviventris)

黑化.definition: to blacken; (slang) to undergo a transformation to a malevolent personality (often, precipitated by intense psychological stress)

黑卷尾.definition: (bird species of China) black drongo (Dicrurus macrocercus)

黑叉尾海燕.definition: (bird species of China) Swinhoe's storm petrel (Hydrobates monorhis)

黑吃黑.definition: (of a villain) to do the dirty on another villain

黑呼呼.definition: variant of 黑糊糊[hei1 hu1 hu1]

黑壓壓.definition: see 烏壓壓|乌压压[wu1 ya1 ya1]

黑天半夜.definition: (idiom) in the middle of the night

黑奴籲天錄.definition: Uncle Tom's Cabin, translated and adapted by Lin Shu 林紓|林纾

黑尾地鴉.definition: (bird species of China) Mongolian ground jay (Podoces hendersoni)

黑尾塍鷸.definition: (bird species of China) black-tailed godwit (Limosa limosa)

黑尾蠟嘴雀.definition: (bird species of China) Chinese grosbeak (Eophona migratoria)

黑尾鷗.definition: (bird species of China) black-tailed gull (Larus crassirostris)

黑山.definition: Montenegro (country); Heishan county in Jinzhou 錦州|锦州, Liaoning

黑山縣.definition: Heishan county in Jinzhou 錦州|锦州, Liaoning

黑幕.definition: hidden details; dirty tricks; dark secrets

黑幫.definition: bunch of gangsters; criminal gang; organized crime syndicate

黑店.definition: lit. inn that kills and robs guests (esp. in traditional fiction); fig. a scam; protection racket; daylight robbery

黑心.definition: ruthless and lacking in conscience; vicious mind full of hatred and jealousy; black core (flaw in pottery)

黑心食品.definition: contaminated food product unscrupulously marketed as wholesome

黑忽忽.definition: variant of 黑糊糊[hei1 hu1 hu1]

黑戶.definition: unregistered resident or household; unlicensed shop

黑手.definition: (fig.) malign agent who manipulates from behind the scenes; hidden hand; (Tw) mechanic; blue-collar worker; manual laborer

黑斑.definition: dark spot or blotch on the skin

黑斑蝗鶯.definition: (bird species of China) common grasshopper warbler (Locustella naevia)

黑旋風.definition: Black Whirlwind, nickname of 李逵[Li3 Kui2], known for his fearsome behavior in combat and his dark complexion

黑暴.definition: (neologism 2019) rioting by black-clothed protesters in Hong Kong

黑板報.definition: blackboard bulletin with short news items written on it (can usually be found in factories, schools etc)

黑枕燕鷗.definition: (bird species of China) black-naped tern (Sterna sumatrana)

黑枕王鶲.definition: (bird species of China) black-naped monarch (Hypothymis azurea)

黑林鴿.definition: (bird species of China) black wood pigeon; Japanese wood pigeon (Columba janthina)

黑格爾.definition: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher

黑框.definition: black frame (esp. around glasses or a funerary portrait)

黑水.definition: Heishui County (Tibetan: khro chu rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang Autonomous Prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan

黑水城.definition: ruins of Heishui Town of Xixia 西夏[Xi1 Xia4] people, in Ejin Banner 額濟納旗|额济纳旗[E2 ji4 na4 Qi2], Alxa League 阿拉善盟[A1 la1 shan4 Meng2], Inner Mongolia

黑水縣.definition: Heishui County (Tibetan: khro chu rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang Autonomous Prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan

黑水雞.definition: (bird species of China) common moorhen (Gallinula chloropus)

黑汗王朝.definition: Karakhan Dynasty of central Asia, 8th-10th century

黑海番鴨.definition: (bird species of China) black scoter (Melanitta americana)

黑炭.definition: coal; charcoal; (of skin) darkly pigmented; charcoal (color); bituminous coal (mining)

黑燈.definition: dark; unlit; a blacklight; an ultraviolet light

黑燈下火.definition: pitch dark; also written 黑燈瞎火|黑灯瞎火[hei1 deng1 xia1 huo3]

黑琴雞.definition: (bird species of China) black grouse (Lyrurus tetrix)

黑白.definition: black and white; right and wrong; monochrome

黑白不分.definition: can't tell black from white (idiom); unable to distinguish wrong from right

黑白分明.definition: lit. black and white clearly contrasted (idiom); fig. unambiguous; black-and-white; in sharp contrast; to distinguish clearly right from wrong

黑白切.definition: (Tw) heibaiqie, side dish of ingredients selected from a range on display, sliced up and served together on a plate (from Taiwanese 烏白切, Tai-lo pr. [oo-pe̍h-tshiat], where 烏白 means "as one pleases")

黑白林䳭.definition: (bird species of China) Jerdon's bush chat (Saxicola jerdoni)

黑白無常.definition: (Chinese folk religion) Heibai Wuchang: two deities, one dressed in black and the other in white, responsible for escorting the spirits of the dead to the underworld

黑百靈.definition: (bird species of China) black lark (Melanocorypha yeltoniensis)

黑盒.definition: black box; fig. system whose internal structure is unknown

黑眉擬啄木鳥.pinyin: hēi méi nǐ zhuó mù niǎo
黑眉擬啄木鳥.definition: (bird species of China) Chinese barbet (Psilopogon faber)

黑眉葦鶯.definition: (bird species of China) black-browed reed warbler (Acrocephalus bistrigiceps)

黑眉鴉雀.definition: (bird species of China) pale-billed parrotbill (Suthora atrosuperciliaris)

黑眼圈.definition: dark circles (under one's eyes); black eye

黑短腳鵯.definition: (bird species of China) black bulbul (Hypsipetes leucocephalus)

黑磚窯.definition: lit. black brick kiln; factories that acquired notoriety in 2007 for slave labor
